title: Hollyoaks spoilers: James arrested for Harry's murder
text:
(Picture: Lime Pictures)

James Nightingale’s (Gregory Finnegan) world came crashing down in Hollyoaks when he learned that the body discovered in the woods belongs to none other than love of his life Harry Thompson (Parry Glasspool). However, his problems are set to get much worse in the coming episodes as he’s arrested for Harry’s murder.

With news of Harry’s death still very fresh, James finds himself struggling to cope. To block out the trauma of losing his boyfriend, he’s been frequently going out partying — much to Marnie’s (Lysette Anthony) dismay. However, things are set to escalate for the solicitor in the coming episodes.

After upsetting Diane (Alex Fletcher) on the previous day, James apologises for what he said. Breda (Moya Brady) proceeds to interrupt the conversation, but not before James admits to having had a tracking app on Harry’s phone — something which he attributes to his paranoia.

Never one to miss an opportunity to save her own skin, Breda attempts to convince James to go down to the station and demand some answers.

Eventually, he agrees to do so, but tragedy strikes, as — after confronting the police over the lack of answers they’ve given him thus far — he’s informed that some new information has come to light. As a result, they arrest him for suspicion of murder.

Later, viewers come to realise that James has been framed.

But by who?

Hollyoaks continues Friday 4th October at 7pm on E4.
